Body.Content:
We will be retiring older browser support from Microsoft Power BI on September 1, 2024. For uninterrupted functionality, we recommend upgrading your browser by August 31, 2024 to the most recent version possible. Learn more: Supported browsers for Power BI and Fabric. - Power BI | Microsoft Learn

Users on unsupported browsers may experience issues when using Power BI when this change is implemented.

This change will happen automatically by the specified date. No admin action is required. Please notify your users about this change and update relevant documentation as appropriate.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: Microsoft Power BI is retiring support for older browsers on September 1, 2024. Users should upgrade their browsers by August 31, 2024, to avoid any disruptions. No admin action is needed, but users should be informed of this change.

Title: Microsoft Power BI: Retiring support for older browsers September 1, 2024
